headline: Is ServiceNow (NOW) Undervalued? A Fresh Look at the Latest Valuation Signals
summary: ServiceNow (NOW) shares dipped slightly today, closing at $930.17, which is just under 1% lower. Despite the modest move, investors appear to be taking a breather after sustained performance over the past month. See our latest analysis for ServiceNow. With today’s dip, ServiceNow's share price remains roughly in line with where it was a month ago. However, momentum has faded since the start of the year. Looking further out, while the 1-year total shareholder return is down just over 2%, those...

headline: Microsoft, Meta Set To Report Earnings As Investors Watch Out For Trump-Xi, Fed Meeting
summary: This week will witness earnings releases from the Magnificent 7 stocks. Investors will await news from Trump-Xi meeting. Read here for more details.
